A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dear Critics\, \n\nClearly Disney has strong-armed you into providing a 93% review rating.  I have no other logical explanation as to how any of you could consider giving this embarrassment more than two stars.  Not commenting on the bad humor\, bad acting\, bad writing and too many subplots is bad enough.  But to dismiss commenting on Luke Skywalker being a whiny\, selfish\, bafoon makes it clear that Disney owns you and your ratings.
